on the subject- I, at once, interpreted them 
as artificial - <s>but <\s> A knowledge of Mr.
Hancocks views however led me to re consider 
the question - <s>[text?]<\s>
If these organs be hearts, in fact,
<u>Rhynchonella <\u> is the most remarkable 
of living mollusks - for it possesses 
<u>four <\u> of them - Two of them occupy 
the same position as in <u>Waldheimia <\u>
<s>and two are <\s> close to the origins of the 
calcareous <s>loop <\s> <s>[text?]<\s> crus - while the 
other two are placed above these - and 
above the mouth one on each side of 
the liver - It is these latter which Prof. Owen 
describes, while he has apparently overlooked 
the other two - at least <s>he says <\s> he says 
(speaking as I presume of <s>[text?]<\s> <u>Rhynchonella <\u>)
